name: 東方鬼形獣～WBAWC All Star【ver 1.00a】
description:
【東方鬼形獣 ～ Wily Beast and Weakest Creature All Star】【ver 1.00a】
- This is a playable script, consist of 6 bosses in a Bosh-Rush-style Touhou, credit to Zun for the characters and OSTs in WBAWC. 
- Instruction: to start the game,  please open LUASTGPlus and launch, then select - AllStar mode and there you go!
- The default life and bomb setting is 5L5B. Enjoy!
- Next update: More spells and an extra boss fight.
